content: ccoouurrttnneeyy kkeelllleeyy directions finishing break yarn leaving an 8 20 cm tail thread through live brim sts and fasten_off soak in cool water and wool wash and using smaller ndl co 90 sts join for working in the round block to measurements being careful not to twist sts pm indicating beg of round work in brim ribbing for 2 5 cm pom pom make a 3 diameter pompom with remaining yarn secure change to larger ndl pom pom to hat and tie off inside body label begin working from chart using sewing thread and a sharp sewing needle sew-on work rnds 1 28 of diamond cable from chart ending kelbourne woolens label to brim as shown last round 2 sts before end of round marker placement see notes begin crown decreases round 1 sl last 2 sts of round onto cn hold back sl m to rh ndl * k2 p2tog from cn k1 sl 2 to cn hold front p2tog k2 from cn p2 mb p1 2x mb p2 sl 2 sts to cn hold back repeat from * 3 times more k2 p2tog from cn k1 sl 2 to cn hold front p2tog k2 from cn p2 mb p1 2x mb p2 80 sts round 2 *k2 p1 k1 p1 k2 p9 repeat from * 3 times more k2 p1 k1 p1 k2 p7 round 3 sl last 2 sts of round to cn hold back sl m to rh ndl * k2 p2tog from cn k1 p1 k1 sl 2 to cn hold front p2tog k2 from cn p1 mb p1 2x sl last 2 sts to cn hold back repeat from * 3 times more k2 p2tog from cn k1 p1 k1 sl 2 to cn hold front p2tog k2 from cn p1 mb p1 2x 70 sts round 4 *k2 p1 k1 2x p1 k2 p5 repeat from * 3 times k2 p1 k1 2x p1 k2 p3 round 5 sl last 2 sts of round to cn sl m to rh ndl * k2 p2tog from cn k1 p1 k1 2x sl 2 to cn hold front p2tog k2 from cn mb sl 2 sts to cn hold back repeat from * 3 times more k2 p2tog from cn k1 p1 k1 2x sl 2 to cn hold front p2tog k2 from cn mb 60 sts round 6 *k2 p1 k1 3x p1 k2 p1 repeat from * to end round 7 * sl 2 sts to cn hold front p1 k2 from cn ssk p1 k2tog sl1 to cn hold back k2 p1 from cn p1 repeat from * around 50 sts round 8 remove m p1 replace m *k2 p3tog repeat from * around 30 sts round 9 *c2/1/2lp p1 repeat from * around round 10 *k2 p1 repeat from * around round 11 *k2 sl 1 st to cn hold back k2 sl purl from cn onto lh ndl without knitting it p2tog repeat from * around 25 sts round 12
